name: Tyrant's Blessing
description:
The world has been overrun by the Dead Army. With every battlefield claimed by the forces of darkness, their numbers grow and victory falls farther out of reach. You must put an end to this, before the invasion becomes a rout.

Key Features
  • Satisfying turn-based tactical play on small maps – every decision counts!
  • Multiple different biomes –desert, forest, frozen wilderness and more– with their own obstacles and hazards
  • Start your journey with any of ten unlockable heroes.
  • Nothing is left to chance – in a system inspired by Into the Breach, your enemy’s next move is always displayed in advance.
  • Dark Blessing – any living unit who falls in battle becomes a conscript of the Dead Army, including your own heroes!
